bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a twisting pain in the heart and abdomen that recurs repeatedly and cannot be healed for an extended period of time. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 23: 沉屍者，發時亦心腹 絞痛，脹滿喘急，沖刺心胸，攻擊脅肋 , “As for sunken corpse [qi] , when it breaks out, one feels a twisting pain in the heart and abdomen, with distension and a feeling of fullness, as well as hectic panting. Heart and chest experience a piercing pain; it also attacks the two flanks”.
